root.name: Trucks and Skulls
root.description: Overview This is how the gameplay looks likeIn this iPhone game player is flinging different kinds of trucks from the ramp at constructions with the goal of destroying every skull on the field, while causing as much damage as possible. Bonus points are awarded for every unused truck. Whole game is in Heavy Metal style, from the design of trucks and levels, to the music and sound effects. Environments (Backgrounds) In order from first to last: Hell's Highway Hell's Highway Haunted WastelandIndustrial ArmageddonThe MoonDemon TownIcepolis Monolithic Types of TrucksTruck TypeDescription Thrustmonster Basic truck, speeds up after touching the screen in mid-air. Doomstone Heavy truck. Bombzilla Releases a bomb after touching the screen in mid-air. Insenerator Explodes after touching the screen in mid-air or shortly after impact. Triclops Releases three projectile-like exhausts after touching the screen in mid-air. Diveosaurus After touching the screen in mid-air, this trucks spins around and dives straight towards the ground.
